comment.text:
Implementing the schema is simple.  Getting Google to process the schema currently requires authentication via DKM or SPF and you must be a medium/large sender of emails[1]. Unfortunately, as a (really) small FOSS project dev.gitblit.com doesn't qualify for processing. :(  But the schema is there so installs that do qualify should get the inbox action link on tickets.

- [1] https://developers.google.com/gmail/actions/registering-with-google
